Class CacheRegistry

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.arch.utils.CacheRegistry

public class CacheRegistry
extends Object

Cache registry keeps all registered caches.

registerCache

public static <C extends Comparable<? super C>> void registerCache(String name,
                                                                   Cache<C> cache,
                                                                   Class<C> codeType)
Registers a cache with a name. If another cache with the same name exists, then a RuntimeException will be thrown.

Type Parameters:
C - Cache code type.
Parameters:
name - Cache name.
cache - Cache to register.
codeType - Type of Cache code.

Clears all the caches referenced by the PoFetcher.
